clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For the treatment of secondary chronic progressive progressive relapsing or worsening relapsing remitting multiple sclerosis

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Mitoxantrone has been shown in vitro to inhibit B cell T cell and macrophage proliferation and impair antigen presentation as well as the secretion of interferon gamma TNFa and IL 2
